future_desc1: To become a leading and reputable consulting and food technology transfer organization, serving as an effective technology bridge for the community of SMEs, household businesses, and OCOP units in Vietnam.
future_desc2: We are committed to continuous innovation and the application of advanced technologies in consulting and technology transfer, aiming to support our clients in developing high-quality, safe, and environmentally friendly food products.
goal_1: Contribute to improving the quality and efficiency of food production
goal_2: Optimize processes and ensure food safety
goal_3: Support products to meet standards and enhance competitiveness
goal_4: Transfer knowledge, create jobs, and ensure stable income
